Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: {VV##52 : GHC.Types.Module | $k_##53}{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module GHC.Ptr_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import GHC.Ptr
 6: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 7: 
 8: {-@
 9: measure pbase     :: GHC.Ptr.Ptr a -> GHC.Types.Int
10: measure plen      :: GHC.Ptr.Ptr a -> GHC.Types.Int
11: measure isNullPtr :: GHC.Ptr.Ptr a -> Bool 
12: 
13: type PtrN a N = {v: PtrV a        | plen v == N }
14: type PtrV a   = {v: GHC.Ptr.Ptr a | 0 <= plen v }
15: 
16: assume GHC.Ptr.castPtr :: p:(PtrV a) -> (PtrN b (plen p))
17: 
18: assume GHC.Ptr.plusPtr :: base:(PtrV a)
19:                 -> off:{v:GHC.Types.Int | v <= plen base }
20:                 -> {v:(PtrV b) | pbase v = pbase base && plen v = plen base - off}
21: 
22: assume GHC.Ptr.minusPtr :: q:(PtrV a)
23:                  -> p:{v:(PtrV b) | pbase v == pbase q && plen v >= plen q}
24:                  -> {v:Nat | v == plen p - plen q}
25: 
26: measure deref     :: GHC.Ptr.Ptr a -> a
27: @-}
